code:
gantt
title Amazoning
dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
axisFormat %d
tickInterval 1day

%% [Infra_IngressController] --> git commit --> blue
%% ** --> notes in Obsidian --> bold

section Deploy
    Deploy on Vercel: dpn, 2023-03-6, 12h

section UI/UX design
    Design prototype: 1d

section Planning
    Map Ebay's API: 12h
        %% Identify all relevant fields

section Front end 
    %% ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ==> H E R E <== ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 
    [Infra_EtcdCluster] Write tests frontend: 4d
    [Infra_WorkerNode] Add normalize.css and font: 12h 
    [Infra_WorkerNode] Add navbar: 6h
        %% logo
    [Infra_RedisCache] Add navbar search bar: 1d
    [Infra_WorkerNode] Add navbar language: 1d
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] Add navbar account: 1d
    [Infra_EtcdCluster] Add navbar orders: 1d
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] Add navbar cart: 1d
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] Add secondary navbar: 6h
        %% Prime video
        %% books
        %% music
        %% buy again
    [Infra_WorkerNode] Add side pannel: 6h
        %% Best seller
        %% new release
        %% Prime video
        %% amazon music
        %% books
        %% Electronics and computers
        %% Beauty & health
        %% Toys, children & baby
        %% Clothes, shoes and jewellery
        %% Sports & outdoors
        %% Your account
        %% language
        %% currency setting
    [Infra_EtcdCluster] Add homepage: 1d
        %% Buy again (Infra_IngressController)
        %% Pick up where you left off (Infra_RedisCache)
        %% Top deal
        %% top movie
        %% selected for you
        %% Inspired by your purchase of ...
        %% You might also like
        %% Explore more items
        %% Best seller books **BANNER**
        %% Review your purchase
        %% Inspired by your browsing history **BANNER**
        %% Your browsing history **BANNER**
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] Add footer: 1d
        %%just copy from amazon, but disable button/link
    [Infra_EtcdCluster] Add account & Lists dropdown: 1d
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] Add account page: 1d
    [Infra_WorkerNode] Add orders page: 1d
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] Add lists page: 1d
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] Add cart page: 1d
    [Infra_IngressController] Secure app: 36h
    [Infra_RedisCache] Alert user that app is not responsive: 36h
    [Infra_WorkerNode] Add Methodology page: 1d
    [Infra_RedisCache] Proof read: 12h

section Back end
    Schema relationship diagram: 1d
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] Write openAPI.yaml: 3d
    [Infra_EtcdCluster] Write tests backend: 1d
    [Infra_WorkerNode] Add API endpoints: 3d
    [Infra_IngressController] Add data validation: 2h
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] Secure app: 36h
    %% ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ==> H E R E <== ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 
    %%             FUTURE
